org.traincontrol.base

Class Locomotive

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.traincontrol.base.Locomotive
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MarklinLocomotive

    public abstract class Locomotive
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract locomotive class Defines all key user-accessible functionality
